name: Dont Let Them Through
description:
Dont let the kids get to Santa's Toy Factory!

Naughty kids have convinced nice kids to raid Santa's Toy Factory to get all the gifts! Trap the naughty kids and gift the nice kids to earn points. But be careful! If try to gift a naughty kid or trap a nice kid they'll speed up!

This game was made for XMas JAM 2018.
